files.patch:
@@ -1725,0 +1725,7 @@ +

Building for Windows AArch64

+

To generate Windows AArch64 builds using Cygwin, the target platform +needs to be set to aarch64-unknown-cygwin. Configure the +build with --openjdk-target:

+
bash configure \
+  --with-boot-jdk=$BOOT_JDK \
+  --openjdk-target=aarch64-unknown-cygwin

@@ -1460,0 +1460,11 @@
+#### Building for Windows AArch64
+
+To generate Windows AArch64 builds using Cygwin, the target platform needs to be
+set to `aarch64-unknown-cygwin`. Configure the build with `--openjdk-target`:
+
+```
+bash configure \
+  --with-boot-jdk=$BOOT_JDK \
+  --openjdk-target=aarch64-unknown-cygwin
+```
+
